Interface MemberWebService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MemberWebServiceImpl

    public interface MemberWebService
    Web service interface for members
    Author:
    luis

    • Method Detail

      • fullTextSearch

        MemberResultPage fullTextSearch(FullTextMemberSearchParameters params)
        Searches for members using a full-text search, according to the search parameters

        Loads a member using it's identifier

        Loads a member using it's username

      • registerMember

        MemberRegistrationResult registerMember(RegisterMemberParameters params)
        Register a new member. The groupId is optional, and only needed when there are multiple groups this channel manages

      • search

        MemberResultPage search(MemberSearchParameters params)
        Searches for members, according to the search parameters

      • updateMember

        void updateMember(UpdateMemberParameters params)
        Updates a member profile. Empty values for name or e-mail means those fields won't be updated. Custom fields which are passed will be updated. Those not included on the array won't. As key to find the member, it's possible to either pass the id or a principal (like username), together with the principal type (optional, assuming the channel's default) when there are more than one options
